historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 9-832.

References in Text

"Sections 301, 302, 303, and 304," referenced in (b), refer to §§ 301, 302, 303 and 304 of D.C. Law 10-188, effective September 28, 1994.

DC CODE § 10-1203.06

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Sections 301, 302, 303, and 304 shall apply as of October 1, 1997.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)
